tachyon.client.keyvalue.hadoop

Class KeyValueOutputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileOutputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable>
      • tachyon.client.keyvalue.hadoop.KeyValueOutputFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.mapred.OutputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable>

    @PublicApi
public class KeyValueOutputFormat
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileOutputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable>
    An OutputFormat implementation to let MapReduce job write to a key-value store under the MapReduce output directory.

    There are different key-value stores under the output directory configured via MapReduce property mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.outputdir for different tasks. The stores are merged into one key-value store under the MapReduce output directory by KeyValueOutputCommitter. TODO(cc): Consider key distributions in each Reducer.

      • checkOutputSpecs

        public void checkOutputSpecs(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem ignored,
                             org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobConf conf)
                      throws org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileAlreadyExistsException,
                             org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InvalidJobConfException,
                             IOException

        KeyValueOutputCommitter is forced to be used.

        NOTE: This method is called immediately when job is submitted, so that modifications to the JobConf are reflected in the whole job.
